name: niche
content:
niche noun [C]
(POSITION)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a job or position that is very suitable for someone, especially one that they like: He has carved/made a niche for himself as a financial advisor.
an area or position that is exactly suitable for a small group of the same type: an ecological niche
